cards.name: Gonti, Canny Acquisitor
cards.text:
Spells you cast but don't own cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, look at the top card of that player's library, then exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

cards.name: Olivia, Opulent Outlaw
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever one or more outlaws you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)
{3}, Sacrifice two Treasures: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Stella Lee, Wild Card
cards.text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
{T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Activate only if you've cast three or more spells this turn.

cards.name: Yuma, Proud Protector
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land card in your graveyard.
Whenever Yuma, Proud Protector enters the battlefield or attacks, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever a Desert card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 4/2 green Plant Warrior creature token with reach.

cards.name: Eris, Roar of the Storm
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast for each different mana value among instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
Flying, prowess
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon Elemental creature token with flying and prowess.

cards.flavorText: Multiple pseudopods and no vital organs make dueling a whole lot easier.
cards.name: Felix Five-Boots
cards.text:
Menace, ward {2}
If a creature you control dealing combat damage to a player causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

cards.flavorText:

cards.name: Kirri, Talented Sprout
cards.text:
Other Plants and Treefolk you control get +2/+0.

cards.name: Vihaan, Goldwaker
cards.text:
Other outlaws you control have vigilance and haste. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Treasures you control become 3/3 Construct Assassin artifact creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.

cards.name: Angel of Indemnity
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
When Angel of Indemnity enters the battlefield, return target permanent card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Encore {6}{W}{W} ({6}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Angelic Sell-Sword
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Angelic Sell-Sword or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with "{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery."
Whenever Angelic Sell-Sword attacks, if its power is 6 or greater, draw a card.

cards.name: Sand Scout
cards.text:
When Sand Scout enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for a Desert card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 1/1 red, green, and white Sand Warrior creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

cards.name: We Ride at Dawn
cards.text:
Legendary creature spells you cast have convoke. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting a legendary creature spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Whenever your commander attacks, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with "{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery."

cards.name: Arcane Heist
cards.text:
You may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into their graveyard, exile it instead.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Forger's Foundry
cards.text:
{T}: Add {U}. When you spend this mana to cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 3 or less, you may exile that spell instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves.
{3}{U}{U}, {T}: You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled with Forger's Foundry without paying their mana costs. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Lock and Load
cards.text:
Draw a card, then draw a card for each other instant and sorcery spell you've cast this turn.
Plot {3}{U} (You may pay {3}{U} and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost. Plot only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Smirking Spelljacker
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Smirking Spelljacker enters the battlefield, exile target spell an opponent controls.
Whenever Smirking Spelljacker attacks, if a card is exiled with it, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Thunderclap Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.text:

cards.flavorText: Daniel's mistake wasn't just coming alone. It was believing his rival had done the same.

tokens.name: Bounty: Eriana, Wrecking Ball
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you committed a crime this turn, collect your reward. (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)

tokens.name: Bounty: Frankie The Fang
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the player with the most life or tied for most life as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Gorra Tash And Silas
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if all opponents were dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Lord Fajjal
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a land card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Lyssa, Sterling Collector
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the player with the most cards in hand or tied for most cards as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Miron Tillas Jr.
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the nearest opponent to your left as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: The Outsider
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Paq, Fleeting Fil Cher
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Ris Sa "Blades" Lee
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn while you had two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Sleepy Sovka
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast no spells this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Squeakers of the Sly
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a legendary creature you controlled attacked alone this turn, collect your reward.

tokens.name: Bounty: Vara Beth Hannifer
tokens.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the nearest opponent to your right as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.
